title: Hello World!
description:
The post is happening!
Hoping to make this into a landing page for some academic info and a mini-tutorial for R/Studio.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Nick's Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Nick's Blog. We hope you enjoy
